description: The Wary Watchman is a vigilant guardian, known for its sharp senses and unwavering focus. Found near the gates of ancient ruins or patrolling quiet villages, this creature rarely misses a detail. With keen eyes and an attuned mind, the Wary Watchman is quick to spot danger and alert allies.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.description: The Wary Watchman has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The Wary Watchman makes two melee attacks with its longsword.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Alertness
actions.description: The Wary Watchman can use its reaction to warn allies, granting them advantage on the next attack roll or saving throw until the end of its next turn.
